* Brand: Vaio
* Make : Sony
* Model: VGN-FS285M
* Website: <nowiki>[[http://www.vaio-link.com/specifications/specifications.asp?l=en&category=-1&serie=-1&m=1866]]</nowiki>

=== Current Issues ===
* Needs install nvidia-glx driver with NvAGP=1 and blacklisting intel_agp module.
* Needs install FSFN for FN-keys.
* In dapper needed to configure Alps touchpad. It worked in a fresh Edgy Flight 2 but stopped working in a later upgrade.

=== System Info ===
* bios-version:R0044J1
* system-manufacturer:Sony Corporation
* system-product-name:VGN-FS285M
* system-version:C300ERME
